mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( provider_code, provider_user_id, email, nickname, profile_image, phone, user_role, point, checklist_alert, reservation_alert, vacancy_alert ) VALUES ( #{providerCode}, #{providerUserId}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{phone}, #{userRole, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{point}, #{checklistAlert}, #{reservationAlert}, #{vacancyAlert} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE provider_code = #{providerCode} AND provider_user_id = #{providerUserId}
mapper.select: SELECT provider_code AS providerCode, provider_user_id AS providerUserId, email, nickname, phone, user_status AS userStatus FROM users WHERE provider_code = #{providerCode} AND provider_user_id = #{providerUserId}
